page.title: 06 THE VICAR - CHESTERTON
page.content: He was ordained 31/2 years ago and has been vicar of Chesterton since march 1984 He also is responsible for the church at Lighthorne, Newbold Pacey and Morton Morrell.He usually works about 10 hours a day but this varies according to the needs of the parishioner. He cares for everyone in his parishes the sick, the needy, and the bereaved as well as holding services in each of his churches.He is married and has three small daughters. His hobbies include gardening,reading and spending time with his family.A typical day is Tuesday 11th June 9.oo school assembly at Morton Morrell 1O.oo am Newbold Pocey visit followed by a funeral,letterwriting and lunch. The afternoon was taken up by showing visitors the church at Chesterton,and visting a dying parishioner.
